'''Dr. Mason''' is a cardiothoracic surgeon at [[St. Ambrose Hospital]].

==History==
Dr. Mason was called in to take over operating on [[Troy Hagen]] so that [[Sam Bennett]] could step out. Before he went in, he applauded Sam for operating on the guy who hit Maya, tipping him off that Pete had lied to him.

==Career==
He is a cardiothoracic surgeon at [[St. Ambrose Hospital]].
